--- title: Run Notebooks keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Lightweight running of notebooks without Papermill" description: "Lightweight running of notebooks without Papermill" nb_path: "nbs/run.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

nbrun[source]

nbrun(fname:Union[str, Path])

Execute notebook.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
_tmp_nb = _gen_nb()
assert '3157' not in _tmp_nb.read_text() #value does not exist before execution
_results = nbrun(_tmp_nb)
assert '3157' in str(_results) # value exists after execution

running: test_files/exec.ipynb
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

nbupdate[source]

nbupdate(fname:Union[str, Path])

Run notebooks and update them in place.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
_tmp_nb = _gen_nb()
assert '3157' not in _tmp_nb.read_text() # doesn't exist b/c notebook hasn't been run
nbupdate(_tmp_nb)
assert '3157' in _tmp_nb.read_text() # exists now b/c notebook has been run

running: test_files/exec.ipynb
finished: test_files/exec.ipynb
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

parallel_nbupdate[source]

parallel_nbupdate(basedir:Union[Path, str], recursive=True, n_workers=None, pause=0.1)

Run all notebooks in dir and save them in place.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
_test_nb = _gen_nb()
assert not '3157' in _test_nb.read_text()
parallel_nbupdate(_test_nb)
assert '3157' in _test_nb.read_text()

running: test_files/exec.ipynb
finished: test_files/exec.ipynb
All notebooks refreshed!
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

nbdoc_update[source]

nbdoc_update(srcdir:str=None, n_workers:int=None, pause:float=0.5)

Refresh all notebooks in srcdir by running them and saving them in place.

Type Default Details
srcdir str `` A directory of notebooks to refresh recursively, can also be a filename.
n_workers int `` Number of workers to use
pause float 5 Pause time (in secs) between notebooks to avoid race conditions
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}
